初遇.encontent:
Have you heard that story? A magical golden lamp, rub it 3 times
 and there was a genie, who can satisfy all your wishes?  Yes
 you say? Well then, go to that guy instead!
初遇.content:
你听说过那个传说吗？一个神秘的金色神灯，只要摩擦三
下就会有个精灵出来满足你的所有愿望？听过？听过就对
了，去找那家伙吧！

箱中气候.encontent:
It is said in a foggy day, there will be ... a faceless
 ghost～ Ha! Haha haha.
箱中气候.content:
传说在这样的大雾天，就会出现没有脸的幽灵～……哇！……嘻
哈哈哈～

致未来.encontent:
People always toss coins and talk about their future
 wishes ...  So why don't they start it right now?
致未来.content:
乱丢硬币的人们总念叨着以后的打算。——那为什么不从
现在开始就多动动手呢？

孑立.encontent:
If you come back now, you will hear my weird wish collection!
  Hey ... are you there?
孑立.content:
如果你现在回来，就能听到我收集起来的奇怪愿望合集咯
——！嘿——你在吗？

问候.encontent:
First, just to be sure, you didn't bring any coins,
 did you?
问候.content: 先确认一下，你身上没带着硬币吧？

朝晨.encontent:
Birdie ... birdie, talk to me. ... Though I don't understand
 a word.
朝晨.content:
鸟儿啊，与我交谈吧～……虽然我完全听不懂你们在叫什
么。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Ah ... Morning morning! Nice, finally wasn't woken
 up by any coins.
信任-朝晨.content: 啊，早上好呢！真不错，今天总算不是被硬币砸醒的。

夜暮.encontent:
OK, that's all for today's spring visit. Go home, people!
 You are dismissed!
夜暮.content: 好了，今天参观喷泉的时间到此结束，都散了吧。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
I can't sleep yet ... Who knows if the daydreamers will come
 back?  ... Just like this. Whoosh! And the coin falls into the
 jar! You have to protect me!
信任-夜暮.content:
我还不能睡觉……谁知道那些做白日梦的家伙还会不会再
来？……像这样，嗖——硬币就突然飞进了罐子！你……你
可要保护好我啊！

帽檐与发鬓.content: 这属于亵渎神明的行为！……难道不算吗？

袖与手.encontent: So, why am I holding a jar?
袖与手.content: 所以说，我为什么要举着这个罐子呢？

衣着与身形.encontent: Hey!! It tickles! Don't do that!

嗜好.encontent:
People always make up those stories: they've met angels,
 their dreams come true ...  Unfortunately, it's me
 they've met!
嗜好.content:
人们总爱编造那些遇见天使实现心愿的事……但是很遗憾
，他们遇见的——是我！

赞赏.encontent:
Well done! I'll give you my permission to wash your
 hands in this jar ... once only!
赞赏.content: 做得真好，我允许你在我的陶罐里洗手，就一次！

亲昵.encontent:
I've heard girls on the outside world wear fashionable
 clothes ... May I have a try?
亲昵.content:
听说外面世界的女孩会穿时髦的衣服，我也可以穿穿看吗
？

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Hey, the Arcanum water purification unit ... You mentioned
 it before ...  What is it?
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
嘿，你之前说的那个……神秘学流动净水装置，是，是什
么呀……

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
There once was a very kind guy. He took away my coins,
 here, one by one carefully ...  Wait, that's the so-called
 thief? What ...
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
我遇到过一个很有公德心的人。他把我罐子里的硬币一个
个细心地捡走了……你说那叫做小贼？啊——

独白.encontent:
What's in the jar, you ask? Gold, jewelry, pine cones
 ...? No no no, there is and there always is, spring
 water.
独白.content:
陶罐里有什么呢？金币、珠宝、松果……不，陶罐里有的
，始终只是泉水而已～

入队.encontent: Hee hee, I got the whole jar of water.
入队.content: 嘻嘻～一大罐子水都能派上用场了～

战前.encontent: I can also grant my enemies' wishes ... in my own way!
战前.content: 敌人的愿望我也可以实现，用我高兴的方式！

受敌Ⅰ.encontent: It's gonna break ... It's gonna break ...

战斗胜利.encontent: The triomphe of the wise La Source for sure!
战斗胜利.content: 当然是智慧的泉中聆听者大～获～全～胜～

洞悉.encontent:
The jar gets heavier ... or lighter? It's heavy and
 light! So weird ... I don't get it!!
洞悉.content:
罐子都变重了呢……不，还是变轻了？又轻又重！真奇怪
啊——我想不通了！！
